sqoop.arg: SELECT _SP_PalletLabelID,PalletID,MachineStage,PartNumber,InvState,PalletNo,CreatedDT,CompleteDT,Quantity,LabelTemplate,PrinterURL,PrintedDT,ScannedDT,IsCancelled,IsReprint,PartDescription,LabelSaveDirectory,IsPrintLandscape,NoCopies,LabelsPerInventoryPack, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_PalletLabel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionChainID,AcquisitionChain,Description, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionChain WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,VariableTypeID,NoHeads,NoSamples,NoPositions,EntryOrder,Formula, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionNoteID,ActionID,Note,Comments,NoteDT,LoginID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionNote WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionTypeID,ActionType,Description,ActionTypeCode,ReportOrder,Format, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetCycleCountID,AssetID,RfDayPeriodID,Count,AssetCountTypeID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetCycleCount WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AttributeTypeID,ProductTypeID,Name,Description,ImageURI,RfAttributeClassID,IsPassFail,IsRaiseCA,LikelyCauses,Impact,Weighting,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,AttributeTypeCode, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT PartID,ParentPartID,SubPartID,BOMItemID,SubPartQuantityTotal,SubPartUnitID,RfInvPackTraceabilityID,Lvl,SortOrder,SubPartQuantity,BOMVariantID,Instructions,RfBOMItemTypeID,IsAllowExceedBOMQty, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CauseActionID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedCauseActionID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CauseAction_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernStatusID,ConcernStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ConcernStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CrnAdapterID,Length,ModifiedDT, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CrnAdapter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DepartmentID,Name,DepartmentGroup,Classification1,PlantID,DepartmentCode,Description, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Department WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT EBATriggerID,RfTriggerTypeID,ContextDictionary,TriggerOwnerID,CreateDT,ProcessedDT,RfWatchProcessStateID,Message,TotalTime,OracleInsertTime,OracleConnectionTime,OracleInsertStatement, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.EBATrigger WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT GaugeID,Gauge,GaugeTypeID,DataDeviceID,SerialNo,SupplierID,DatePurchased, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Gauge WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT InventoryUsageID,JobID,MachineStageID,InventoryPackID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,IsReintroduced,Quantity, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryUsage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineCellID,LineID,IsPartNumber,IsWONumber,IsCustomer,IsDescription,IsHeader,IsRows,ConfigLayout,IsClickable,IsStopJob,IsStartJob,IsEditable,IsStartNextJob,IsWORef1,IsWORef2,IsWORef3,IsWorkInstruction, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineCell WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineInfoID,ModifiedDT,IsOEEInventoryIsolation,IsOEEInventoryReintroduction,IsOEESpoilage,IsOEEDowntime,IsOEEInventoryProduction,NoBottlenecks,BottleneckMachineStageID,IsCountOutputInventory,IsCountInputInventory,IsOEEProductionUnits,LoginID,SessionID,PlantID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineInfoRecalc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionGroupID,AcquisitionVariantID,Sequence,LkAGAVID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkAGAV WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernID,DocumentID,LKConcernDocumentID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernDocument WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCRuleID,RfCutByID,LkCutBySPCRuleID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkCutBySPCRule WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentWIProcID,WorkInstructionProcedureID,DocumentID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentWIProc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkLineLineGroupID,LineGroupID,LineID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLineLineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkMaintProcPersonnelID,MaintenanceProcedureID,PersonnelID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMaintProcPersonnel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,LkOpTMSTID,PassName, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartID,LineSectionID,LkPartLineSectionID,TheoreticalCycleTime, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartLineSection WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkShiftMachineStageID,MachineStageID,ShiftID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKShiftMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolTypeID,OperationTypeID,MaxNoTools,LkToolTypeOpTypeID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkToolTypeOpType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VarChartOCID,RfViolationRuleID,LkVCOCVRuleID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkVCOCVRule WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineGroupID,MachineGroup,Description,IsRetired,RfMachineGroupTypeID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageInvPositionId,MachineStageId,Position,PositionNumber, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageInvPosition WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopReasonGroupID,MachineStopReasonGroup,Description,MachineStopReasonGroupCode, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopReasonGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenancePartUsedID,MaintenanceWorkID,MaintenanceProcedureResultID,PartID,Cost,DT,LoginID,Quantity,UnitID,InventoryPackID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenancePartUsed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,MaintenanceProcedureID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,LoginID,ModifiedDT,RevisedMaintProcID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureRevision WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,WorkDone,Comments,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWork_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MeasurementSetID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedMSID,ApprovalLoginID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSet_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SerialNo,TimePacked,IMS_No, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ModulePackedDateTime_Buffer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCDigitalID,OPCItemID,Description,Formula,VariableTypeID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCDigital WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCMachineEventID,OPCItemID,Description,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID,RfMachineStopRecordModeID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCMachineEvent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCSpeedID,OPCItemID,Description,Scale,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCSpeed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartClassificationID,PartClassification,RfPartClassificationID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartClassification WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PLCID,PLC,Description, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PLC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductionStopReasonID,ProductionStopReason,Description,StopCode,RfLineStopReasonTypeID,RfStopRelativeToJobID,IsPlanned,IsDefaultNoJobReason,IsRetired, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStopReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapID,ScrapReasonID,PartID,Quantity,UnitID,DT,MachineStageID,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Scrap WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantDefaultsID,StartOfDay,StartOfWeek,StartOfYear,RfLocaleID,RfDefaultCurrencyID,DataEntryDefaultURI,OnDataCommitGoTo,ChainToStopped,ColourStagesForCurrentJob,UnAckAlarmsPeriod,ShowOverdueIcon,ShowAlarmIcon,WONumberModeID,IsShowVarClassCombo,IsShowAcqClassCombo,RfMachineStopRecordModeID,IsAutoCreateProductsForParts,IsAutoCreateProductTypeForPart,EnforceClosedAlarms,ColourOrder,IsAutoReleaseJob,JobClose,IsAllowDuplicateWONumbers,WoClose,IsOverdueRefToJob,DefaultSPCCalcStyleID,IsAllowInventoryInserts, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantDefaults WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ShiftlyChecksDoneID,shiftid,jobid,fromdt,todt,partid,acquisitioncontextid,machinestageid,acquisitionvariantid,acquisitionid,downtime,uptime,total_time,datacollectionperiod,checks_req,checks_req_after_downtime,checks_done,updated_dt, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftlyChecksDone WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCCalcStyleID,SPCCalcStyle,CmThreshold,CpThreshold,PpThreshold,CgThreshold,RnRThreshold,IsShowCpOnlyIfStable,CAMTarget,CpBasedOnID,CLBasedOnID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCCalcStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetID,SPCChartSet,AcquisitionID,SPCURI,RfDataBandID,NPeriods,SpecTypeID,IsRunningProductOnly,LHSessionID,MaxTrendRecallWindow, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSet WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultViewID,Sequence,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,AcquisitionUsageID,OverlayFlags, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SupplierID,Supplier,SupplierCode,AddressID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Supplier WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagListID,ListName,VariantNo, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagList WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagProfileID,Name, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagProfile WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTypeID,RfDataTypeID,Name,TagTypeCode,ISSYSTEM,TAGVIEW, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,MachineStageID,JobID,PartID,FromDT,ToDT,Downtime,Total_Time,Uptime, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Jobs_In_Shifts WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolAtLocationID,LocationID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,EditedToolAtLocationID,MovedByLoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolAtLocation WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolGroupID,ToolGroup,Description,ToolGroupCode, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolUsageID,StartUsingComments,ToolChangeComments,StartLoginID,ChangeLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedChangeDT,SavedStartDT,SavedChangeDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedToolUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT UnitCountID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedUnitCountID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCount_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableID,VariableTypeID,ProductID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Variable WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT VarMeasurementID,SpecID,MeasurementSetID,Measurement,Ignored,VariableTypeID,ProductID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,DT,RfIsOSID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarMeasurement WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WOID,BaseWONumber,Txn_date,Wip_Entity_ID,Alternate_Bom,WO_Status,IsBtoCto, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WorkInstructionStepID,WorkInstructionStep,WorkInstructionProcedureID,OperationTypeID,StepOrder,RfSpecialActionTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Location.LocationID, Location.Location, Location.LocationTypeID, Location.IsRetired, Location.MaxQuantity, Location.LocationCode, Location.Description, LocationType.LocationType, LocationType.LocationTypeCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM Location FULL JOIN LocationType ON (Location.LocationID = LocationType.LocationTypeID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WO.WOID, WO.WONumber, WO.RunNo, WO.PartID, WO.QuantityOrdered, WO.RfJobStatusID, WO.DeadlineDT, WO.ActualStartDT, WO.ActualEndDT, WO.PlannedStartDT, WO.PlannedEndDT, WO.EstimatedStartDT, WO.EstimatedEndDT, WO.CustomerID, WO.IsDiscrete, WO.Reference1, WO.Reference2, WO.Reference3, WO.Reference4, WO.Reference5, WO.WORefID, WO_.CustomerOrderNo, WO_.LabelsPerInventoryPack, WO_.ItemsPerInventoryPack, WO_.ItemsPerLayer, WO_.LayersPerInventoryPack, WO_.PackingCode, WO_.LabelTemplate, WO_.LabelColour, WO_.EANCode, WO_.CusStartNum, WO_.CusEndNum, WO_.CustomerPartNo, WO_.CustomerPartDescription, WO_.LabelText1, WO_.LabelText2, WO_.LabelText3, WO_.PrinterURL, WO_.BOMVariantID, WO_custom.BaseWONumber, WO_custom.Txn_date, WO_custom.Wip_Entity_ID, WO_custom.Alternate_Bom, WO_custom.WO_Status, WO_custom.IsBtoCto, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM WO FULL JOIN WO_ ON (WO.WOID = WO_.WOID) FULL JOIN WO_custom ON (WO.WOID = WO_custom.WOID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
